game.name: Reenchant
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 《Reenchant》是一款冥想风格的塔防游戏，你将作为古老的树灵守护森林，抵御伐木者的入侵。让自然重新绽放，感受它的美丽。
game.shortDescriptionEn: The lumberjacks are close to destroying the Heart of the Forest! Only you, the ancient Tree Spirit, may still be able to stop them. Defend, restore, and enjoy the beauty of nature in this meditative Tower Defense Game.
